plugins.name: Radix color palette
plugins.description:
Step 1: Enter a base color in the Accent section to generate a palette.

Step 2: Copy the accent scale generated below.

Step 3: Copy the CSS code from:

.root, .light, .light-theme { ... }

Step 4: Repeat Steps 1–3 for the Dark Theme.

Step 5: Create a collection in Figma with two modes named exactly: Light Mode, Dark Mode (Case-sensitive)

Step 6: Paste the Light and Dark theme CSS into their respective input fields in the plugin.

Step 7: Click the "Create Variables" button.

Step 8: Edit variable names as needed in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Copy Radix CSS code and paste it here to instantly add your custom palette variables to the file.

136337.name: Radix color palette

136337.tagline: Copy Radix CSS code and paste it here to instantly add your custom palette variables to the file.

plugins.name: 혼용되는 외래어, 한자어 & 금용용어 사전
plugins.description:
혼용되는 외래어와 한자어, 어려운 금융 용어까지 한눈에!

이 서비스는 일상에서 자주 접하지만 정확히 알기 어려운 단어들을 쉽게 풀어주는 언어 가이드입니다.

단어의 출처, 의미, 바른 사용법은 물론, 대체 가능한 순우리말까지 함께 제공하여

더 정확하고 이해하기 쉬운 소통을 도와드립니다.


📘 외래어 vs 한자어 구분

💬 금융 용어 번역과 설명

🔍 혼동되는 표현 비교


언제나 쉽고, 누구나 알 수 있도록.

“이 단어, 정말 맞는 표현일까?” 고민될 땐, 지금 바로 검색하세요.


A guide to mixed foreign, Sino-Korean, and finance terms — all in one place.

This service helps you understand commonly used yet often confusing words with ease.

We offer origins, meanings, proper usage, and even alternative native Korean terms,

making communication clearer and more accurate.


📘 Distinguish foreign vs Sino-Korean terms

💬 Translate and simplify financial jargon

🔍 Compare confusing expressions side-by-side


Simple. Understandable. For everyone.

“Is this the right word to use?”

Just search and find out.

accepted.name: kenny
accepted.description: I am a designer who creates the tools and experiences that users truly need. I believe good design goes beyond visuals, flow and development.

plugins.tagline: 낯선 단어, 친절한 해석 (Confusing Words, Clear Meanings)

plugins.name: Riido
plugins.description:
디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업


피그마와 뤼이도를 연동해 디자이너와 개발자의 작업 흐름을 자연스럽게 연결하세요.

디자이너는 더 이상 뤼이도에 직접 들어가 작업 상태를 수정할 필요 없이, 피그마에서 디자인 작업만 해도 자동으로 뤼이도에 최신 상태가 반영됩니다.

개발자는 언제 어떤 디자인이 완료되었는지 실시간으로 확인할 수 있어, 놓치지 않고 바로 개발을 시작할 수 있습니다.


주요 기능


🔗 Figma 디자인과 작업을 연결

작업과 연결된 프레임, 섹션, 페이지를 플러그인에서 바로 확인할 수 있습니다.

연결된 작업을 클릭하면 해당 디자인으로 이동할 수 있어 맥락 파악이 쉬워집니다.


🔄 Figma에서 바로 작업 상태 업데이트

디자인이 완료되면, Figma 안에서 작업 상태를 ‘완료’로 변경할 수 있어 매번 뤼이도에 접속하지 않아도 됩니다.


🧭 작업 히스토리와 현재 상태 추적

플러그인 안에서 작업 목록, 상태, 담당자, 우선순위 등을 한눈에 확인할 수 있어,

디자인과 개발 간에 엇갈림 없이 협업할 수 있습니다


뤼이도와 피그마의 유기적인 연결로

더 빠른 작업 전달, 더 적은 커뮤니케이션 비용, 더 집중된 업무를 경험해보세요.
plugins.tagline: 디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업

plugins.name: Elemental
plugins.description:
Elemental lets you export images and copy color and shadow values in a single click—no need to set a layer to export, or break a color style to see the hex value. Elemental is built for those quick one-off moments when a developer needs an asset or another app is asking for your primary brand color.


What it does:

  1. Export one or more layers as images in your desired file type and size
  2. Copy the fill color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  3. Copy the stroke color of a layer to clipboard in your desired value type
  4. Copy a layer's shadows in css format


How it works:

  1. Keep your Elemental panel handy
  2. Select a layer
  3. Click your desired export or copy button
plugins.tagline: Snag basic assets in a flash

136742.name: Elemental
136742.description:
Elemental lets you export images and copy color and shadow values in a single click—no need to set a layer to export, or break a color style to see the hex value. 136742.tagline: Snag basic assets in a flash

plugins.name: Lazer
plugins.description:
Lazer is a plugin for Figma that provides quick commands to adjust the layout and appearance properties of selected elements. It is somewhat opinionated.


The idea is to leave the keyboard less by creating pseudo shortcuts. By bringing up the Actions input with command + K or command + / and then typing a short code (eg. w.h), the fuzzy search will bring your focus to an action you can execute by pressing enter.


I used Gemini 2.5 Pro to build this.


Features

This plugin allows you to quickly adjust:


Width & Height

w.h - Set Width to Hug

h.h - Set Height to Hug

w.f - Set Width to Fill

h.f - Set Height to Fill

w.. - Set Width (prompts for custom value)

h.. - Set Height (prompts for custom value)


Padding

p.0 - Set All Padding to 0

p.16 - Set All Padding to 16

p.. - Set Padding (prompts for custom value)


Auto Layout

al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment (opens alignment UI)

al.h - Set Auto Layout to Horizontal

al.v - Set Auto Layout to Vertical

g.0 - Set Gap to 0

g.8 - Set Gap to 8

g.16 - Set Gap to 16

g.. - Set Gap (prompts for custom value)


Border Radius

br.0 - Set Border Radius to 0px

br.8 - Set Border Radius to 8px

br.. - Set Border Radius (prompts for custom value)


Stroke

s.0 - Set Stroke Width to 0

s.1 - Set Stroke Width to 1

sw.. - Set Stroke Width (prompts for custom value)

sc.. - Set Stroke Colour (prompts for custom value)


Fill

f.1 - Add White Fill

f.0 - Remove All Fills

f.. - Set Fill Colour (prompts for custom value)


Text

ls.. - Set Text Letter Spacing (prompts for custom value)

t.s - Set Text Size (prompts for custom value)


General

help! - Show Commands and Shortcuts (displays this list in a popup)


Usage

  1. Open the Actions input with command + K or command + /
  2. Type the short code for the command (eg. w.h)
  3. Press enter (assuming you have your desired command in focus)


* Many commands apply adjustments directly (e.g., w.h - Set Width to Hug).

* The al.. - Set Auto Layout Alignment command will open a dialog for visual alignment selection.

* Commands ending with .. (e.g., p.. - Set Padding) will prompt you to enter a custom value.
plugins.tagline: Shortcuts as quick actions to help you Figma faster

plugins.name: Extractor
plugins.description:
Components as you go.


As you design, systems, patterns, and components naturally emerge. With Extractor, you can select your working frames, instantly extract them to a component, and automatically replace the original selection with a component instance.


This approach lets you focus on the details while future-proofing designs and aligning process more closely with development.


Simply select your frames and access the "Extract Component" command using CMD + P.


Feedback form →
plugins.tagline: Components as you go

135192.name: Extractor
135192.description:
Components as you go.


As you design, systems, patterns, and components naturally emerge. With Extractor, you can select your working frames, instantly extract them to a component, and automatically replace the original selection with a component instance.


This approach lets you focus on the details while future-proofing designs and aligning process more closely with development.


Simply select your frames and access the "Extract Component" command using CMD + P.


Feedback form →

plugins.name: Bangalicon
plugins.description:
🔥 Bangalicon - The First Icon Plugin You Will Ever Need For Figma


Now, with a new Plugin of Bangalicon, you can get more than 500 high-quality SVG icons right in your Figma workflow. Bangalicons' curated collection of beautifully crafted icons spanning interfaces, communication, business, media, and more is at your fingertips now. It has been meticulously designed for speed, flexibility, and pixel perfection.


✨ Key Features:


500+ icons: Scalable and diverse as per the requirement.


Live Preview & Insert: You can browse, search, and without leaving Figma, icons can be inserted seamlessly which saves time.


Category-based filtering: Finding what you want is made easier because of organized categories.


Will Bangalicon work on IOS apps? Yes. Whether it is website designing or mobile marketing visuals, Bangalicon for Figma is guaranteed to raise your level of design visually in an instant.


⚡️ Save time and design better with Bangalicon.
plugins.tagline: The world of most creative icons

138809.release_notes:
- Added style switcher popup (Regular ↔ Solid) for selected frames
- Improved icon preview UI with better search and filtering
- Optimized drag-and-drop for smoother icon placement
- Fixed icon insertion bug in some nested frames
- Minor performance and loading speed improvements
138809.tagline: The world of most creative icons

plugins.name: QR Code Automation
plugins.description:
This plugin allows you to update / replace all QR codes in your Figma file with just one click! You have the total control over sizes, and Color!


How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)
  3. Create one or multiple rectangles (squares) and name them "QR-Code".
  4. Create a second text layer
  5. Name the text layer "QR-color", and add the Hex code of the color you want your QR-Code to have inside the text layer.
  6. Run the Plugin


The plugin will generate a QR code using the content from the "QR-Link" text layer. It will place the QR code over each rectangle named "QR-Code" and match the dimensions of the rectangle. If the rectangle is inside a frame, the QR code will be placed inside that frame as well.


If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.


Hint:

  1. It's not a problem if there are multiple text layers named "QR-Link" — just make sure that all of them contain the exact same text content. Otherwise, the plugin will not run.
  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
plugins.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

134125.name: QR Code Automation
134125.description:
This plugin allows you to update / replace all QR codes in your Figma file with just one click! You have the total control over sizes, and Color!


How to use it:


  1. Create a text layer.
  2. Name the text layer "QR-Link". (You can change the content of this layer at any time — the name should remain "QR-Link".)

If you run the plugin again, the existing QR codes will be replaced with the updated ones.

  2. It does not matter if you add the Hex-code with or without the #
134125.tagline: Auto update multiple QR-Codes with one click

plugins.name: Ethos
plugins.description:
Ethos offers a top-notch brand asset management software solution and tools to streamline and organize your digital assets effortlessly.

- Create and share your own custom brand showrooms as an interactive website and pdf, and showcase and maintain your branding best practices.

- Share your official brand copy, brand logos, brand colors, brand fonts, brand rules and custom brand sections.

- Deploy your brand voice and image correctly to activate your powerful brand position.

- Improve your existing brand copy to bring it to the next level with artificial intelligence.

- Make your brand more authentic and cohesive by generating expanded primary, secondary and monotone color palettes.

- Invite your team and clients to your official brand spaces, and enable collaboration on one or more brands at a time.


For any questions or feedback, feel free to ping us at team@yourethos.io

plugins.name: ComponentFiller AI
plugins.description:
ComponentFiller は生成AIを用いて、選択したフレームの原稿と、人間が用意したコンポーネントのコードを組み合わせ、コンポーネントに適切な原稿を入力したコードを返します（要APIキー／Gemini のAPIは無料で取得できます）


利用方法

  1. 利用するAIのAPIを選択
  2. APIキーを入力
  3. 利用する言語と、言語に合わせた基本のプロンプトを設定（任意）
  4. ベースとなるコンポーネントのコードを入力
  5. 利用したいフレームを選択
  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---


ComponentFiller uses generation AI to combine the script for the selected frame with the component code prepared by humans, and returns a code with the appropriate script entered into the component (API key required).


How to use

  1. Select the AI ​​API to use
  2. Enter the API key
  3. Set the language to use and the basic prompt for the language (optional)
  4. Enter the base component code
  5. Select the frame you want to use
  6. Generate code


Please note: Your data will be sent to the AI ​​service of your choice to generate the code.
plugins.tagline: Insert the text from the design data into your code

133684.description:

  3. 利用する言語と、言語に合わせた基本のプロンプトを設定（任意）
  4. ベースとなるコンポーネントのコードを入力

  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---

plugins.name: Background Manager
plugins.description:
Background Manager makes it easy to switch your Figma canvas background between light, dark, or any custom color — instantly.


Use presets, apply hex values, or pick your own color with a live preview. Includes an optional "close after apply" toggle and resizable window for a smooth, focused workflow.


Built for designers who care about context, mood, and file readability.


  1. Light, Dark, and Custom background modes
  2. Color picker + hex input
  3. Auto-syncs to your current canvas background
  4. "Close after applying" option
  5. Minimal, Figma-native UI
plugins.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

130561.name: Background Manager
130561.description:
Background Manager makes it easy to switch your Figma canvas background between light, dark, or any custom color — instantly.


Use presets, apply hex values, or pick your own color with a live preview. Includes an optional "close after apply" toggle and resizable window for a smooth, focused workflow.


Built for designers who care about context, mood, and file readability.

  2. Color picker + hex input
  3. Auto-syncs to your current canvas background

  5. Minimal, Figma-native UI
130561.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

plugins.name: Namer | Неймер
plugins.description:
Namer renames selected frames based on their position (top-to-bottom, left-to-right) on the canvas, ignoring layer hierarchy. Adds sequential numbers with your custom prefix: Prefix_1, Prefix_2, etc.


Неймер переименовывает выбранные фреймы по их расположению на рабочей области (сверху-вниз, слева-направо), игнорируя иерархию слоев. Добавляет порядковые номера с вашим префиксом: Префикс_1, Префикс_2 и т.д.


How to Use / Как использовать:

  1. Select frames → Open plugin → Click "Переименовать".
  2. Выберите фреймы → Запустите плагин → Нажмите «Переименовать».
plugins.tagline: Rename frames by position, not layers. / Переименовывает фреймы по расположению, а не слоям.

128205.name: Namer | Неймер
128205.description:
Namer renames selected frames based on their position (top-to-bottom, left-to-right) on the canvas, ignoring layer hierarchy. Adds sequential numbers with your custom prefix: Prefix_1, Prefix_2, etc.

  2. Выберите фреймы → Запустите плагин → Нажмите «Переименовать».
128205.tagline: Rename frames by position, not layers. / Переименовывает фреймы по расположению, а не слоям.

plugins.name: LARA for Figma
plugins.description:
LARA is the flagship product of Lithero, the first AI company to design and build products specifically for pharma marketing teams. LARA is a custom-made AI that learns the nuances of pharma brands at lightspeed, supporting brand teams throughout the end-to-end content creation process.


The official LARA for Figma plugin brings the power of LARA Screen and LARA Claims to your workspace. Get actionable feedback on the compliance of your content at the point of creation, saving significant time downstream. LARA for Figma complements the content creation process by ensuring high quality and accuracy of created content. Shorten review cycles, reduce spend, and get the most out of Figma with LARA!


Key Features:

Claims

- Detect differences between created content and approved claims, enabling corrections before MLR

- Trace claims back to their references and associated safety text in LARA Claims for additional context


Safety Text

- Identify and insert any required safety text missing from the content

- Generate accurate & complete safety text blocks to insert into content


References

- Find potential approved references that could be used to substantiate claims

- Locate any claims that are missing citations to typically seen references


*Requires subscription to LARA Claims and Screen. For more information, visit https://www.lithero.com/
plugins.tagline: Bring the power of LARA to your process

136539.description:

plugins.name: 图像矢量化 Image Tracer
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to convert raster images into scalable vector graphics with a single click. Enhance your design process by transforming pixel-based images into smooth, resolution-independent vectors directly within Figma.


Function Description

  1. Vectorizes selected image nodes into SVG format.
  2. Preserves image structure and generates editable vector paths.
  3. Outputs scalable vector graphics compatible with Figma’s design tools.


How to Use

  1. Select an image node on your Figma canvas.
  2. Click the “Vectorize Image” button in the plugin UI.
  3. The plugin will generate an SVG vector output placed adjacent to the original image node.


Notes

  1. Ensure only one image node is selected before using the plugin.
  2. Only image nodes are supported for vectorization. Non-image nodes will not be processed.
  3. Large images may take additional time for processing.


介绍

此 Figma 插件支持一键将光栅图像转换为可缩放的矢量图形，让您在 Figma 内直接将像素图转换为平滑的、分辨率无关的矢量图，从而提升设计流程。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的图像节点矢量化为 SVG 格式。
  2. 保留图像结构，生成可编辑的矢量路径。
  3. 输出的矢量图与 Figma 的设计工具兼容。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 画布上选择一个图像节点。
  2. 点击插件界面的“矢量化图像”按钮。
  3. 插件将在原始图像节点旁生成一个 SVG 矢量输出。


注意事项

  1. 请确保使用插件前只选中了一个图像节点。
  2. 仅支持对图像节点进行矢量化，非图像节点将无法处理。
  3. 对于较大的图像，处理时间可能会稍长。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Convert Images to Vectors Seamlessly

138820.name: 图像矢量化 Image Tracer

plugins.name: 一键翻译元素 Quick Translate
plugins.description:
Introduction

Quick Translate is a Figma plugin designed to help you instantly translate selected text elements into different languages with just one click. Save time and improve your workflow by translating text directly within your design files.


Function Description

  1. Translate selected text elements into a specified target language.
  2. Supports multiple languages and automatic translation of all text layers in a Figma selection.
  3. Easy-to-use interface to select languages and apply translations quickly.
  4. Ideal for designers working on multilingual projects or collaborating with global teams.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more text elements in your Figma file.
  2. Open the plugin from the "Plugins" menu.
  3. Choose the target language for translation.
  4. Click the "Translate" button, and the selected text will be replaced with the translated version.


Notes

  1. Ensure your Figma selection includes text elements, as the plugin only works with text layers.
  2. The translation may vary depending on the accuracy of the API and the language selected.
  3. For optimal results, select only relevant text elements to avoid unnecessary API calls.


介绍

Quick Translate 是一款 Figma 插件，旨在帮助您一键翻译选中的文本元素。通过该插件，您可以直接在 Figma 文件中将文本翻译为不同语言，节省时间，提高工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文本元素翻译为指定的目标语言。
  2. 支持多种语言，并自动翻译 Figma 选择中的所有文本图层。
  3. 提供简单易用的界面，可以快速选择语言并应用翻译。
  4. 适用于多语言项目的设计师，或者与全球团队协作的设计师。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个文本元素。
  2. 从“插件”菜单打开插件。
  3. 选择目标翻译语言。
  4. 点击“翻译”按钮，选中的文本将被翻译并替换。


注意事项

  1. 请确保您的 Figma 选择包含文本元素，因为插件只支持文本图层。
  2. 翻译效果可能会根据 API 的准确性和所选语言有所不同。
  3. 为了获得最佳效果，建议只选择相关的文本元素，以避免不必要的 API 请求。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quick Translate: Instant Translation for Figma Elements

plugins.name: Align Auto Layout
plugins.description:
MacOS shortcut setup:

System Settings → Keyboard → Keyboard Shortcuts → App Shortcuts → “+”.

App: Figma.

Menu Title:

Plugins->Align Auto Layout->Move alignment up

(repeat for down/left/right).

Press the desired keys, e.g. ⌃⌥W, and save.

Your new keys now trigger the plugin commands in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Instantly nudge auto-layout frames—left, right, up, down—for lightning-fast design workflows.

plugins.name: Token Exporter Pro
plugins.description:
Export Figma color, gradient, and shadow tokens with one click — no fluff, just clean, dev-ready output.


Choose your naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, dot.notation…), match your framework (React, Tailwind, or plain CSS), and get tokens you can actually use.


Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

✅ Shadow exports (drop & inner)

✅ Format-ready for Tailwind, JSON, and SCSS

✅ Works great with Style Dictionary or custom configs


Perfect for design system handoffs, developer styling, and anyone who’s tired of manually formatting hex codes.
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma — with naming styles, framework formats, gradients & shadows.

138641.name: Token Exporter Pro
138641.description:
Export Figma color, gradient, and shadow tokens with one click — no fluff, just clean, dev-ready output.


Choose your naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, dot.notation…), match your framework (React, Tailwind, or plain CSS), and get tokens you can actually use.


Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

✅ Shadow exports (drop & inner)

✅ Format-ready for Tailwind, JSON, and SCSS

✅ Works great with Style Dictionary or custom configs


Perfect for design system handoffs, developer styling, and anyone who’s tired of manually formatting hex codes.
138641.release_notes: Added "documentAccess": "read" to support newer Figma permissions
138641.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma — with naming styles, framework formats, gradients & shadows.

plugins.name: Jo - Instant Design Feedback
plugins.description:
Stop designing in the dark.

Jo gives you instant validation without leaving Figma.


Two ways to get unstuck:

🔍 Heuristic Check — Usability feedback against Nielsen's 10 principles

Select a frame → get ranked issues with specific fixes


📊 Quick Poll — Stakeholder sign-off in minutes

Select 2-4 frames → Generate link → teammates vote/comment (no Figma login required)


Why designers are loving Jo:

✅ In-Context Feedback: Feedback panel sits right next to your canvas.

🎯 Actionable Insights: Specific fixes, not vague opinions.

⏱️ Zero Meeting Overhead: Async feedback that actually works.

🔁 Iteration-Friendly: Tweak, test, and ship with confidence.


Perfect for:

Validating concepts, streamlining stakeholder buy-in, catching usability issues before dev handoff.


Ready to design with confidence?

Install Jo today and transform your feedback loops!
plugins.tagline: Get AI and teammate feedback on your designs. No meetings, no guesswork.

plugins.name: Token Extractor & Kotlin Exporter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you seamlessly export your design system tokens from Figma to Android development with Kotlin.


🎯 Key Features

• Scan selected components or frames for design tokens

• Supports primitives, spacing, and typography

• Converts tokens into Android-compatible Kotlin objects (Colors.kt, Dimens.kt, Typography.kt)

• Outputs clean, structured Kotlin code using dp, sp, and Color(...)

• Friendly UI with JSON preview and file export options


Perfect for Android teams using Jetpack Compose and looking to keep design & code in sync.
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma to Android-ready Kotlin files.

plugins.name: Variable Linter
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that helps analyze, audit, and replace variables in your Figma designs. Scan selected layers for bound variables, categorize them by source, and efficiently replace variables with those from approved collections.


Features


🔍 Variable Analysis


Deep Scanning: Analyzes nested components, variants, and instances

Source Categorization: Identifies variables as local, team library, or orphaned

Type-Safe Analysis: Categorizes variables by type (color, number, string, boolean)

Real-time Results: Instant scanning of selected layers


📊 Variable Management


Approval System: Mark specific variable collections as approved replacement sources

Bulk Operations: Replace multiple variables of the same type simultaneously

Individual Replacement: Replace variables one at a time with precise control

Orphan Detection: Identifies variables that no longer exist in their collections


🎯 Smart Filtering


Toggle Views: Switch between all variables and unapproved variables only

Sortable Tables: Sort by name, type, value, or source

Search & Filter: Find specific variables quickly


📋 Team Library Integration


Library Detection: Automatically identifies team libraries and shared collections

Permission Management: Configure which collections can be used as replacement sources

Compatibility Checking: Ensures replacement variables match original types
plugins.tagline: Scans for variables in a selection and reports the source(s) of those variables.

plugins.name: Bulk Remove Variants
plugins.description:
This plugin can be used to bulk remove specific variants of a component set. Select one or many component sets that share property names, then define the variant names you wish to remove.


This plugin was originally created for bulk removing variants from an icon set.
plugins.tagline: Bulk remove specific variants of a ComponentSet

plugins.name: Invoicely
plugins.description:
Create clean, professional invoices directly inside Figma — no extra tools needed.


Invoicely lets freelancers, designers, and agencies generate stylish invoices in seconds with pre-built templates, client autofill.


✦ Select a template

✦ Add your client and items

✦ Hit “Generate Invoice” — done.


Built for speed. Designed for simplicity.

accepted.name: Diego Grillo
accepted.description:
I like building things that people use.
Mostly simple, useful, sometimes weird.
Currently shipping plugins, tools & ideas.

plugins.tagline: Quick Invoice Maker for Figma

137998.name: Invoicely
137998.description:
Create clean, professional invoices directly inside Figma — no extra tools needed.


Invoicely lets freelancers, designers, and agencies generate stylish invoices in seconds with pre-built templates, client autofill.


✦ Select a template

✦ Add your client and items

✦ Hit “Generate Invoice” — done.


Built for speed. Designed for simplicity.
137998.release_notes:
This is the first public release of Invoicely.

✔️ All core features are working:

Template selection

Client & sender input

Tax customization

Instant invoice generation

Fully editable directly in Figma

⚠️ Minor note:
Some alignments in the invoice template aren’t pixel-perfect yet.
We wanted to ship early and improve fast — updates are already planned to polish everything.

Stay tuned for more features and improvements coming soon!

plugins.name: Chat IO
plugins.description:
AI-Powered Chat Interface

- Interactive AI Assistant : Chat with an AI that analyzes your selected Figma content (text layers, frames, components)

- Context-Aware Responses : The AI understands your selected design elements and provides relevant feedback

- Multi-language Support : Automatically detects and responds in the user's language

- Conversation Memory : Maintains context between messages for coherent discussions


Smart Text Replacement System

- AI-Driven Content Generation : Replace selected text layers with AI-generated content based on custom instructions

- Multiple Layer Support : Handle single or multiple text layers simultaneously

- Pre-built Templates : Quick-access buttons for common tasks:

- Summarize : Condense text content concisely

- Improve Text : Enhance clarity, reduce repetition, fix sentence structure

- Improve CTA : Optimize call-to-action buttons following UX best practices

- Task Generator : Convert project descriptions into actionable to-do lists
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma plugin for intelligent content generation and design feedback using LLM API.

137903.name: Chat IO
137903.description:
AI-Powered Chat Interface

- Interactive AI Assistant : Chat with an AI that analyzes your selected Figma content (text layers, frames, components)

- Context-Aware Responses : The AI understands your selected design elements and provides relevant feedback

- Multi-language Support : Automatically detects and responds in the user's language

- Conversation Memory : Maintains context between messages for coherent discussions


Smart Text Replacement System

- AI-Driven Content Generation : Replace selected text layers with AI-generated content based on custom instructions

- Multiple Layer Support : Handle single or multiple text layers simultaneously

- Pre-built Templates : Quick-access buttons for common tasks:

- Summarize : Condense text content concisely

- Improve Text : Enhance clarity, reduce repetition, fix sentence structure

- Improve CTA : Optimize call-to-action buttons following UX best practices

- Task Generator : Convert project descriptions into actionable to-do lists
137903.tagline: AI-powered Figma plugin for intelligent content generation and design feedback using LLM API.

plugins.name: Harmony – Snap Any Design to Your System Styles
plugins.description:
Clean up designs by applying styles and variables from your design system!


This plugin automatically snaps every color, text style, spacing, and radius in your design to the nearest matching style token from your design system.


Disclaimer: the design styles and variables should be present in the file


Whether you’re importing AI-generated UIs or working with inconsistent layouts, this tool ensures pixel-perfect alignment to your style guide.


It identifies and merges duplicate styles, normalizes paddings and spacings to a consistent grid and applies variables also to the spacing padding from your design system-keeping your file tidy, lightweight, and production-ready.

Perfect for design system maintainers, UI/UX designers, and teams working with handoff-ready components.


✅ Matches colors using advanced perceptual comparison

✅ Aligns font sizes and weights to existing text styles

✅ Snaps corner radii and auto-layout spacing to your token grid

✅ Cleans unused styles with detailed before/after stats

✅ Works with selections or full-page scans


Please message any feedback or suggestion on sanjogbora@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Auto-apply your design system styles and variables to imported designs.

138575.name: Harmony – Snap Any Design to Your System Styles

plugins.name: Figma to chaquen generator
plugins.description: Plugin para exportar texto e imágenes desde mockups. Para ello, deben llamarse los frames que desean exportarse como texto como note y dentro del mismo colocar la capa de texto que desea exportarse, puede nombrarse como h1, h2 o h3 si se desea poner el texto como un título.
plugins.tagline: Figma plugin para exportar contenido de figma a texto e imagen en taiga.

plugins.name: Simple Ruler
plugins.description:
📐 四辺定規システム

  1. パネルの上下左右すべての辺に精密な目盛りを表示
  2. ピクセル単位での正確な測定が可能


🔍 自動ズーム対応

  1. Figmaのズーム率変化をリアルタイム検知
  2. ズーム率に応じて目盛り間隔を自動調整
  3. 常に実際のピクセル値を正確に表示
  4. ズーム率表示の場合は、クリックすることでデザインデータを等倍に


📏 リサイズ機能

  1. 8方向のリサイズハンドル（四隅 + 各辺中央）
  2. ドラッグ操作で自由にサイズ変更可能
  3. リサイズ中も目盛りがリアルタイム更新
  4. 邪魔にならないように、折りたたんで端に寄せることが可能（最小化／展開）


📊 情報表示パネル

  1. 現在のサイズを「幅 XXXpx × 高さ XXXpx」形式で表示
  2. ズーム率を「実寸大」「ズーム率 XXX%」形式で表示
plugins.tagline: プラグインウインドウでデザインデータ内のオブジェクトのサイズを直感的に計測できます。

138193.release_notes: デザインデータがズームされた状態の場合、SImple Ruler内のズーム率の表記箇所をクリックすれば、デザインデータを等倍にできるようになりました。
138193.tagline: プラグインウインドウでデザインデータ内のオブジェクトのサイズを直感的に計測できます。

plugins.name: Tint & Shade Generator
plugins.description:
Quickly generate a color palette from any given color directly inside Figma. Choose how many shades and tints you'd like to generate — the plugin dynamically creates balanced variations optimized for both light and dark mode interfaces.


Each color swatch is clearly labeled for readability. Perfect for building design systems, theming user interfaces, or exploring creative color variations.


Simple, clean, and efficient — made for everyday design workflows.
plugins.tagline: Generate a full color palette from any color with clear labels, supporting light and dark modes.

137104.name: Tint & Shade Generator
137104.description:
Quickly generate a color palette from any given color directly inside Figma. Choose how many shades and tints you'd like to generate — the plugin dynamically creates balanced variations optimized for both light and dark mode interfaces.


Each color swatch is clearly labeled for readability. Perfect for building design systems, theming user interfaces, or exploring creative color variations.


Simple, clean, and efficient — made for everyday design workflows.
137104.tagline: Generate a full color palette from any color with clear labels, supporting light and dark modes.

plugins.name: FREE QR Code Generator
plugins.description:
Create QR codes without leaving Figma. Simply enter a URL or any text, generate a preview, and insert the QR code as an image onto your design canvas. Perfect for designers adding quick links, app downloads, or promotional codes to mockups and prototypes.


Features:


Instant QR code generation from any link or text


Preview QR code before inserting


Insert high-quality QR code image directly into your Figma file


Simple and sleek UI designed for ease of use

accepted.name: Open Wave.io
accepted.description: Open Wave is an open-source organization Founded by Lawrence Okosa III. creating tools that streamline design and development workflows.

plugins.tagline: Generate QR codes quickly inside Figma for FREE

136705.name: FREE QR Code Generator
136705.description:
Create QR codes without leaving Figma. Simply enter a URL or any text, generate a preview, and insert the QR code as an image onto your design canvas. Perfect for designers adding quick links, app downloads, or promotional codes to mockups and prototypes.


Features:


Instant QR code generation from any link or text


Preview QR code before inserting


Insert high-quality QR code image directly into your Figma file


Simple and sleek UI designed for ease of use

networkAccess.reasoning: Needed to fetch base64 data URLs for inserting QR code images.

136705.tagline: Generate QR codes quickly inside Figma for FREE
